long_description: The REI Sariska Print tunic complements your yoga practice with incredibly soft, moisture-wicking fabric that keeps you comfortable during in any pose. Polyester and spandex blend provides moisture-wicking comfort with a touch of stretch. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Internal shelf bra offers light support and includes molded, removable bra cups to enhance support and fit. Mesh bra lining and plush elastic enhances comfort and breathes well. The REI Sariska Print Tunic offers an active fit that moves effortlessly with the body and won't bind or twist.
short_description: The REI Sariska Print tunic complements your yoga practice with incredibly soft, moisture-wicking fabric that keeps you comfortable during in any pose.
